JobFullDesc:
Energy Impact Partners (EIP) is a global investment platform leading the transition to a sustainable energy future. EIP brings together bold entrepreneurs and some of the world’s most forward-looking energy and industrial companies to advance clean energy innovation. EIP has over $1.5 billion in assets under management and invests globally across venture, growth, and credit.

Energy Impact Partners LP is seeking an Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) & Impact Associate to work on the ESG team, based in New York. This role is remote at least until September 2021.

Key areas of responsibility:


Support EIP’s ESG initiatives, including:
	
ESG due diligence for new investment opportunities
Coordinate directly with portfolio companies to collect ESG data
Co-author EIP’s annual ESG & Impact Performance Report
Track industry developments in ESG trends
Support EIP’s LP ESG Advisory Board

Respond to investors’ due diligence requests related to ESG
Ad hoc projects related to ESG processes and reporting

The ideal candidate will have:


Minimum 1 year of relevant experience
Masters degree in relevant field strongly preferred
Education and experience include quantitative measurement of carbon emissions and other environmental impact measures
Familiarity with the substance and process of ESG measurement and reporting in financial sector
Familiarity with energy and utility industry and its data resources
Experience with energy measurements and impact calculations
Strong Microsoft Office, Excel, and PPT skills
Intellectual curiosity and humility
The ability to work independently, effectively multi-task, manage deadlines, learn quickly, and possess superior attention to detail
Good oral, writing, and visual communication skills
High IQ, EQ and ethical standards
